message.body: Everything great. Mark moved out to his mom's. he is being very cooperative and kind. So far so good. Thanks for all the prayers.
That is amazing. I have so much respect for the way you have proceded. Very mature.
That is wonderful. I hope the kids are well. How is your mother?

Soraya is very angry but she is a drama queen. So that is alright. She is also in intensive therapy...the boys I haven't seen them yet since last night when we announced the separation to the kids together...my mom is happy but very tired and her leg has flared up form too much walking and carrying.
